Program Community Rules

Participants will respect these principles...

  Definition:

  • We have the right to express ourselves and participate freely in an online class. We should treat each other with courtesy and respect.
  • It is normal and encouraged to share different perspectives but offensive or inappropriate language is not to be used in any form of communication e.g., emails, discussion postings, group projects, submitted assignments.

  Definition:

  • To protect each otherâ€™s privacy and safety, we may not record any part of the lecture.

  Definition:

  • We should participate in all class activities with honesty and integrity.
  • Plagiarism or cheating will not be tolerated.

  Definition:

  • We should protect our personal information in online environments and share sensitive information with caution.
  • When in doubt, always consult a parent or the instructor.
